  • Field Details

    • PROGRAM_ACCOUNT

      public static final PublicKey PROGRAM_ACCOUNT
      The public key for the Token 2022 program account.

      This constant defines the public key associated with the Solana account for the Token 2022 program. It is set to the value returned by Solana.account(byte[]) using the TOKEN_2022_PROGRAM_ID.
